title: Spike Feresten
description:
Spike Feresten is the host of Spike's Car Radio, a rabid Porsche collector, and TV producer.

 

Check out his show: https://www.podcastone.com/spikes-car-radio

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Watch the show on  YouTube: https://youtu.be/pn4aYaI-RfQ
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
